dcterms:creator: X. Gong
X. Liu
Y. Li
dcterms:description: The Internet dataset consists of thousands of downloaded images from the internet, specifically focusing on three classes: airplane, car, and house. The dataset is used to evaluate co-segmentation methods.
dcterms:title: Internet dataset

dcterms:creator: W. Li
O. H. Jafari
C. Rother
dcterms:description: The iCoseg dataset contains 643 images divided into 38 object groups, with pixel-wise hand-annotated ground truth provided. It is used for evaluating co-segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: iCoseg dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Gong
X. Liu
Y. Li
dcterms:description: The MLMR-COS dataset includes images with simple backgrounds generated by single colors, suitable for co-segmentation tasks. It consists of multiple categories with a total of 16,002 images.
dcterms:title: MLMR-COS dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Rother
T. Minka
A. Blake
V. Kolmogorov
dcterms:description: The Pascal VOC 2012 dataset includes 11,540 images with ground-truth detection boxes and 2,913 images with segmentation masks, widely used for training and evaluating segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: Pascal VOC 2012

dcterms:creator: C. Rother
T. Minka
A. Blake
V. Kolmogorov
dcterms:description: The MSRC dataset consists of 591 images across 21 object groups, with roughly labeled ground-truth that does not align exactly with object boundaries, used for segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: MSRC dataset
